metadata.title: CVE-2018-9861 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Enhanced Image (aka image2)plugin for CKEditor (in versions 4.5.10 through 4.9.1; fixed in 4.9.2), asused in Drupal 8 before 8.4.7 and 8.5.x before 8.5.2 and other products,allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script through a craftedIMG element.

criterions.comment: ckeditor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
